title: Five Ten TrailCross GTX is a Gore-Tex lined waterproof flat pedal MTB shoe with cuffs
content:
Five Ten, the mountain bike and climbing arm of Adidas, have today released the first ever flat pedal mountain bike shoe to feature a Gore-Tex liner. That makes the Five Ten TrailCross GTX a ridiculously attractive option as we head toward the wet and sloppy conditions the shoulder season will reliably bring. A proper waterproof [â€¦]

The post Five Ten TrailCross GTX is a Gore-Tex lined waterproof flat pedal MTB shoe with cuffs appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
